original_text: “Next they traveled through the wilderness, skirted the lands of Edom and Moab, passed along the eastern side of the country of Moab, and camped on the other side of the Arnon. They did not enter the territory of Moab, for the Arnon was its border.
korean_text: 그 후에 광야를 지나 에돔 땅과 모압 땅을 돌아서 모압 땅의 해 뜨는 쪽으로 들어가 아르논 저쪽에 진 쳤고 아르논은 모압의 경계이므로 모압 지역 안에는 들어가지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Next they traveled through the wilderness
skirted the lands of Edom and Moab
passed along the eastern side of the country of Moab
and camped on the other side of the Arnon
They did not enter the territory of Moab
for the Arnon was its border
